current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To require the Secretary of Transportation to modify the final rule relating to flightcrew member duty and rest requirements for passenger operations of air carriers to apply to all-cargo operations of air carriers, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

header.#text:
Modification of
			 final rule relating to flightcrew member duty and rest requirements for
			 passenger operations to apply to all-cargo operations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall modify the final rule specified in

so that
			 the flightcrew member duty and rest requirements under that rule apply to
			 flightcrew members in all-cargo operations conducted by air carriers in the
			 same manner as those requirements apply to flightcrew members in passenger
			 operations conducted by air carriers.
